en-US.summary: Answer questions to hear a suggested career.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask decision tree to start over
en-US.name: Decision Tree
en-US.description:
Ask Decision Tree for help choosing your ideal career.

Alexa will provide an ideal career by asking a series of questions and giving you an answer.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Decision Tree" or "Alexa, open Decision Tree" to get started".

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
